H0.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Lightning Rod

H1.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Postal System Improvements

H2.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Franklin Stove

H3.text: what inventions were made by ben franklin. Bifocals

A4.text: Franklin, predating Diviš's work, independently developed and popularized his own lightning rod design, which became widely adopted across Europe and North America.

A5.text: The first proper lightning rod was assembled by Father Prokop Diviš, a Czech priest and scientist, who erected a grounded lightning rod in 1754.

A6.text: The Franklin stove is a metal-lined fireplace named after Benjamin Franklin, who invented it in 1742.

A7.text: In 1742, Franklin finished his first design which implemented new scientific concepts about heat which had been developed by the Dutch physician Herman Boerhaave (1668–1738), a proponent of Isaac Newton's ideas.
